English: to restrain, control oneself, be moderate
to acquire, get, come across, manage
to say goodbye, bid adieu, emit, discharge, set forth, dismiss, give notice
to spoil, make vain or conceited
to pursue, chase, hunt down, persecute
to rule, govern, be in charge of, reign
to render, conquer, subdue, deliver, give up, fatigue, exhaust, wear out, yield, bring
to quarrel, fight, scold, tell off, reprimand
to dress up the walls, decorate
